bibl.title: A Soldier and a Horse (P. Mich. Inv. 7009).
bibl.note: Acquired in 1983, recovered from cartonnage (from a cemetery in the general area of El-Lahun, south of Hawara). Fragment of a letter (second half of the 3rd century B.C.). The text appears to involve a soldier, a horse, the formulation of an order and a prohibition, and a reference to a payment to the royal treasury.
bibl.seg: PARCA Maryline, A Soldier and a Horse (P. Mich. Inv. 7009).

Acquired in 1983, recovered from cartonnage (from a cemetery in the general area of El-Lahun, south of Hawara). Fragment of a letter (second half of the 3rd century B.C.). The text appears to involve a soldier, a horse, the formulation of an order and a prohibition, and a reference to a payment to the royal treasury.
